title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7210.3 - Designation of officer of the day
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7210.3 - Designation of officer of the day

State Regulations

The commission shall designate one of its members or
administrators as the officer of the day. Such person shall be responsible for
making decisions governing emergencies and the granting of substitute jail
orders at such times when the commission is not assembled, when a determination
by the commission is not obtainable, or at times when the commission deems
appropriate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7210.3

Renumbered from 7300.3

New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
